question: Can I increase my mortgage pre-approval amount with an annual income of $80,000 and a current mortgage rate of 3.5%?
true_answer: You can potentially increase your pre-approval amount by improving your DTI and credit score. Current rate 3.5% is favorable.

Plan: 1) Consult home_loan_agent for pre-approval criteria. 2) Verify credit with credit_agent. 3) Use calculator for affordability. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Provide answer.

Calculating affordability based on $80,000 income and 3.5% rate.
